review: Just recently purchased my Amazon Fire TV Stick a couple days ago. I wish it was cheaper, but the Fire TV stick is the best $40.00 I have ever spent to improve my electronic experience. It allowed me to integrate all the technology together whether it was through mirroring or playing Spotify from my phone. Not only that but connect to Netflix or HBO to watch Game of Thrones or many of the other great movies and T.V. shows out today. Trust me, I went back and forth for 6 months debating whether I wanted to buy this. Well worth it.
